channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [removed] Security and Compliance Center (compliance)
item.description: Service functionality is now available in Security and Compliance Center Workload Protection. Get started by creating instances at https://cloud.ibm.com/workload-protection/catalog/security-and-compliance-center-workload-protection.

item.title: [updated] watsonx.governance (aiopenscale) was removed from the Tokyo catalog
[updated] Fresche Security Suite (fresche-security-suite-v2) has changed the description of the plan named security-suite---software-and-services
item.description: *before*: Proactive monitoring and remediation services of predefined IBM i security events. Includes full suite of IBM i auditing, security, detection, MFA and encryption software., *after*: Proactive monitoring and mitigation services of predefined IBM i security events. Includes full suite of IBM i auditing, security, detection, MFA and encryption software.

item.title: [updated] Verify (security-verify) has changed the description of the plan named verify-lite
item.description:
*before*: The Lite plan for IBM Verify offers everything you need to start protecting your consumer and workforce identities from the cloud.
This Lite plan service has limits. To remove those limits, a full purchased version of Verify is required., *after*: The Lite plan for IBM Verify offers everything you need to start protecting your consumer and workforce identities from the cloud.
This Lite plan service has limits. To remove those limits, a full purchased version of Verify is required.

item.title: [updated] watsonx Orchestrate (watsonx-orchestrate) has removed the plan named premium-agentic-messages
[updated] Watson Discovery (discovery) has changed the description of the plan named plus
item.description: *before*: Learn more about plan billing and limits here https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/discovery-data?topic=discovery-data-pricing-plans. Plus plan instances can't be downgraded to lower-tier plans., *after*: Learn more about plan billing and limits here https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/discovery-data?topic=discovery-data-pricing-plans. Plus plan instances can't be downgraded to lower-tier plans.
